articles.author: Inga Kiderra
articles.title: Dogs use two-word button combos to communicate, study shows - Phys.org
articles.description: A new study from UC San Diego's Comparative Cognition Lab shows that dogs trained to use soundboards to "talk" are capable of making two-word button combinations that go beyond random behavior or simple imitation of their owners. Published in the journal Scie…

articles.author: Eduardo Cuevas
articles.title: Can raw milk make you sick? Officials crack down amid bird flu fears. - Yahoo! Voices
articles.description: Research has shown the highest traces of bird flu virus detected on the cow are around its mammary glands and in the milk itself.
articles.content:
Federal and state officials say pasteurized milk available in grocery stores is safe from bird flu but caution that raw milk is not.
So how do you know what you're drinking is safe?
